name: SUPER CONVERGER
description:
Decimate hideous creatures while the walls close in! A Roguelike shooter where you descend into an alien nest and tear up everything you see. 

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left mouse button to shoot
  • Right mouse button to detonate a grenade

GamePad is supported!

  • Left analog stick to move
  • Right analog stick to aim
  • R2 to shoot 
  • L2 to detonate a grenade

How to play:

The purple walls will sap your health so carve your way through with your blaster.

Find your way towards the warp pads to descend further, but bullets are limited so be careful!

Blue, red, and green power ups refill AMMO, GRENADES, and HEALTH respectively.

Sleeping aliens are scattered around; If you break the nest around a creature it will attack!

Known Bugs:

  • Will rarely hang on loading the level.  Not sure if it's only the initial load or not.
  • HTML5 is just weird sometimes. There's a Windows download if it doesn't play in browser.
  • Full screen button works on... some systems.
  • The depth level might not reset. No idea how that even happens. It's one variable.

Thank you so much for playing my game!
